org.radix.serialization2

Class ClassScanningSerializerIds

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.radix.serialization2.ClassScanningSerializerIds
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SerializerIds
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CollectionScanningSerializerIds

    public abstract class ClassScanningSerializerIds
extends java.lang.Object
implements SerializerIds
    Class that maintains a map of serializer IDs to Class<?> objects and vice versa.

    This SerializerIds operates by scanning a supplied list of classes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected ClassScanningSerializerIds(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<?>> classes)
      Scan for all classes with an SerializerId annotation in the specified set of classes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      java.lang.Class<?> getClassForId(java.lang.String id)
      Return an object's class, given the ID.
      java.lang.String getIdForClass(java.lang.Class<?> cls)
      Return the serializer ID, or null if no serializer known.
      boolean isSerializableSuper(java.lang.Class<?> cls)
      Return true if class is serializable, or a supertype of a serializable class, excluding Object.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClassScanningSerializerIds

        protected ClassScanningSerializerIds(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<?>> classes)
        Scan for all classes with an SerializerId annotation in the specified set of classes.
        Parameters:
        classes - The list of classes to scan for serialization annotations
        Throws:
        SerializerIdsException - If two or more classes are found with the same SerializerId

      • getClassForId

        public java.lang.Class<?> getClassForId(java.lang.String id)
        Description copied from interface: SerializerIds
        Return an object's class, given the ID. If the serializer ID is unknown, null is returned.
        Specified by:
        getClassForId in interface SerializerIds
        Parameters:
        id - The serializer ID to find the mapped class for.
        Returns:
        The class corresponding to the serializer ID, or null if serializer ID unknown.

      • isSerializableSuper
